00028 #ifndef LINEARSPRINGWITHVARIABLESPRINGCONSTANTSFORCE_HPP
00029 #define LINEARSPRINGWITHVARIABLESPRINGCONSTANTSFORCE_HPP
00030 
00031 #include "GeneralisedLinearSpringForce.hpp"
00032 
00033 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00034 #include <boost/serialization/base_object.hpp>
00035 
00036 // Needed here to avoid serialization errors (on Boost<1.37)
00037 #include "ApcTwoHitCellMutationState.hpp"
00038 #include "BetaCateninOneHitCellMutationState.hpp"
00039 
00043 template<unsigned DIM>
00044 class LinearSpringWithVariableSpringConstantsForce : public GeneralisedLinearSpringForce<DIM>
00045 {
00046     friend class TestLinearSpringWithVariableSpringConstantsForce;
00047 
00048 private :
00049 
00051     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00058     template<class Archive>
00059     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00060     {
00061         // If Archive is an output archive, then '&' resolves to '<<'
00062         // If Archive is an input archive, then '&' resolves to '>>'
00063         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<GeneralisedLinearSpringForce<DIM> >(*this);
00064         archive & mUseEdgeBasedSpringConstant;
00065         archive & mUseMutantSprings;
00066         archive & mMutantMutantMultiplier;
00067         archive & mNormalMutantMultiplier;
00068         archive & mUseBCatSprings;
00069         archive & mUseApoptoticSprings;
00070         archive & mBetaCatSpringScaler;
00071         archive & mApoptoticSpringTensionStiffness;
00072         archive & mApoptoticSpringCompressionStiffness;
00073     }
00074 
00075 protected :
00076 
00078     bool mUseEdgeBasedSpringConstant;
00079 
00081     bool mUseMutantSprings;
00082 
00084     double mMutantMutantMultiplier;
00085 
00087     double mNormalMutantMultiplier;
00088 
00090     bool mUseBCatSprings;
00091 
00093     bool mUseApoptoticSprings;
00094 
00096     double mBetaCatSpringScaler;
00097 
00099     double mApoptoticSpringTensionStiffness;
00100 
00102     double mApoptoticSpringCompressionStiffness;
00103 
00104 public :
00105 
00109     LinearSpringWithVariableSpringConstantsForce();
00110 
00114     ~LinearSpringWithVariableSpringConstantsForce();
00115 
00121     void SetEdgeBasedSpringConstant(bool useEdgeBasedSpringConstant);
00122 
00131     void SetMutantSprings(bool useMutantSprings, double mutantMutantMultiplier=2, double normalMutantMultiplier=1.5);
00132 
00138     void SetBetaCateninSprings(bool useBCatSprings);
00139 
00145     void SetApoptoticSprings(bool useApoptoticSprings);
00146 
00160     double VariableSpringConstantMultiplicationFactor(unsigned nodeAGlobalIndex,
00161                                                       unsigned nodeBGlobalIndex,
00162                                                       AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>& rCellPopulation,
00163                                                       bool isCloserThanRestLength);
00164 
00171     void AddForceContribution(std::vector<c_vector<double, DIM> >& rForces,
00172                               AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>& rCellPopulation);
00173 
00177     double GetBetaCatSpringScaler();
00178 
00184     void SetBetaCatSpringScaler(double betaCatSpringScaler);
00185 
00189     double GetApoptoticSpringTensionStiffness();
00190 
00196     void SetApoptoticSpringTensionStiffness(double apoptoticSpringTensionStiffness);
00197 
00201     double GetApoptoticSpringCompressionStiffness();
00202 
00208     void SetApoptoticSpringCompressionStiffness(double apoptoticSpringCompressionStiffness);
00209 
00218     virtual void OutputForceParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile);
00219 };
